node.description: Selection of SYSMON to read. 0: SYSMON in primary SLR. [1, 4]: SYSMONs in additional SLRs, if present. See the 'num_slrs' status register for the number of SLRs present.
The number of SLRs present in the FPGA. Each SLR has its dedicated SYSMON. Use the 'sysmon_select' control register to determine which SYSMON to read.
Logical OR of all alarm flags, for all SYSMONs.
Logical OR of over-temperature alarm flags of all SYSMONs.
Logical OR of user-level over-temperature alarm flags of all SYSMONs.
Logical OR of VCCINT alarm flags of all SYSMONs.
Logical OR of VCCAUX alarm flags of all SYSMONs.
Logical OR of VCCBRAM alarm flags of all SYSMONs.
More details about the actual DRP register contents can be found in Xilinx UG580.
FPGA die temperature. Conversion (for internal reference and 10 MSBs only): (ADC_code x 509.3140064 / 2^10) - 280.23087870 [C].
VCCINT. Conversion (for internal reference and 10 MSBs only): (ADC_code / 2^10) * 3 [V].
VCCAUX. Conversion (for internal reference and 10 MSBs only): (ADC_code / 2^10) * 3 [V].
VREFP. Conversion (for internal reference and 10 MSBs only): (ADC_code / 2^10) * 3 [V].
VREFN. Conversion (for internal reference and 10 MSBs only): (ADC_code / 2^10) * 3 [V].
VCCBRAM. Conversion (for internal reference and 10 MSBs only): (ADC_code / 2^10) * 3 [V].
